# Subgroup estimates


```{r, echo=FALSE, out.width="80%", fig.cap="", message=FALSE}

library(here)

tab=readRDS(here("figure-data/subgroup_results.RDS")) %>% mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~ round(.x, 2)))
```
